--- Nosecone / Scattershot / Afterburner ---

Nosecone sighs, and keeps plodding along. "It appears that we are 
following orders, and are not really required to think rationally. Do 
not worry, we are quite capable of doing any thing we want, perhaps 
occasionally with the help of Computron though." He continues 
driving, and waits, giving Lightspeed a chance to talk.

Scattershot speeds along, and enters the hideout right after Strafe. 
Afterburner arrives close on his heals. None of the wonder where 
Nosecone is though. Scattershot transforms, and lands beside 
Ironhide. "Strafe, Afterburner. Wait for the rest of the Technobots 
to arrive, the we'll form Computron to clean up this mess. 
Afterburner you stay with Strafe." Afterburner nods to Scattershot, 
and Ironhide. "Arright boss, as long as I get to kick some 
Decepticraps soon, I'm good." He smiles at the though of battle with 
Decepticons.
